messages.content: What is your availability?
Product availability is updated in real-time.
What should I know about the payment methods?
We accept credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.
What should I know about the contact support?
You can contact support via email or live chat.
Can you explain the password reset?
Use the 'Forgot Password' link to reset your password.
Details about the account creation, please.
Click on Sign Up to create an account.
I have a question about the password reset.
Use the 'Forgot Password' link to reset your password.
Can you explain the gift cards?
Gift cards are available from $10 to $500.
Tell me about the customer reviews.
You can read reviews on each product page.
Could you clarify your loyalty program?
Earn points on every purchase with our loyalty program.
What should I know about the international shipping?
We ship to over 100 countries worldwide.
Details about the exchange policy, please.
Exchanges are accepted within 30 days with receipt.
What is your product warranty?
All products come with a 1-year warranty.

Refunds are processed within 5–7 business days.
